Side Effects: Mom hads kidney disease_ 18 months agon had MRI with Omniscan and was recently diagnosed with Nephrogenic Systemic Fibrosis_ a disease that could kill her.
Comments: Turns out_ NSF is seen mainly in kidney patients who have MRIs with gadolinium contrast dyes like Omniscan.  The FDA just had the maker of Omniscan_ General Electric and the other dyes put a warning on the labels of these medications.  Butit is too late for my mom.  I got a lot of information about omniscan here:  http://www.yourlawyer.com/topics/overview/omniscan_gadolinium
